revised_title: Bistable Behavior of Light Waves in Graded-Index Planar Waveguides with Nonlinear Substrate
tldr: The authors studied the bistable behavior of light waves in a graded-index planar waveguide with a nonlinear substrate. They found that the waveguiding structure exhibits the same bistable behavior as a nonlinear interface, with instabilities occurring at specific incident intensities. The feedback mechanism is provided by the evanescent field in the nonlinear medium, affecting the phase shift between incident and reflected beams.
